sub_title: Always looking for a new logistics challenge, please do not hesitate to challenge me. I prefer roles like: Project manager, Consultant, Logistics change manager, Information system engineer.
summary:
It makes me happy and very enthusiast when I have a job in the dynamic logistics business.
As an engineer with a bachelor in business administration I have always had a passion to build an organization from a plan to a fully operational company making a profit. My interest in computer system technology, robotics, change management, electronics, electric energy, building operational teams has given me a rich experience in working with people on new business adventures.
As an entrepreneur I have experience building my own business. I have had final responsibilities for logistics business operations for more than 15 years and did grow these businesses to successful companies with up to 350 persons.
Since 2010 Valtese is my business tool to execute my assignments in the logistics business;
 - IS engineer build/implement smart data sharing platform for the air cargo industry.
 - Redesign / optimize supply chain of mayor manufacturer in the food industry.
 - Implement new warehouse with racking, storage shuttles, setup warehouse SOP.
 - Make tender response including warehouse design for FMCC customer, 12.000 m2. 
 - Project management, build & implement 2 A-frame order picking robots for 1.500 SKU.
 - Project management, build for Central Filling a 30 work stations kitting line.
 - Make and follow up project proposal papers like: URS / FRA / PRA / test-scripts / UAT for CF according ISO 13485 directive in compliance with GDP.
 - Project management, redesign / build redundant cooling cells for medicine storage 1.200 SKU.
 - Supply chain engineer, make & execute order pick optimization plan 22.000 SKU, relocate 1.500 medium movers (in ERP system and physical) to A-Frames.
 - Supply chain engineer, build & relocate 3 warehouses for Hospital, Inco and CMR.
 - Senior logistics consultant optimize distribution network, realize 20% reduction, e g € 6 mln.
 - Continuous improvement manager, implement RCA, CA/PA, Kaizen 5S, TQM, Muda’s, Six Sigma, Value Stream Mapping as a route to Operational Excellence.
 - Logistics manager run operations in distribution center including global FG distribution and after sales service for ± 1.000 field service engineers in Europe, industrial branch.
 - Operations build 2 computer assembly lines, 40+ FTE including system integration of  ERP systems with WMS & TMS systems, including scheduling & planning of sourcing.
 - Project manager, organize ± 65 rework projects (in 11 years), starting within 48 hours after initial request, 10 FTE to 350

projects.title: Exel Technical Services
projects.description:
Repair 40.000 laptops for Apple Computer
Rework 250.000 printers for Canon
Rework 5.000 Point-of-Sales for Epson
Rework 2.000 Copiers for Ricoh

contributors.headline: Always looking for a new logistics challenge, please do not hesitate to challenge me. I prefer roles like: Project manager, Consultant, Logistics change manager, Information system engineer.

projects.title: Assess and select New ERP system HSS
projects.description: Identify, assess and select a new ERP system for an organisation with 140 FTE and around 65 IT users. With the help of 2 systems engineers, Bob from Hamilton Standard, Masaschusets / USA and Menno from Storkdata we identified 12 posible ERP candidates, we did visit some 8 candidates for an extensive assessment on capabilities and installed base. Bringing the possible candidates back to 2. This project was completed within 3 mants after the start.

contributors.headline: Always looking for a new logistics challenge, please do not hesitate to challenge me. I prefer roles like: Project manager, Consultant, Logistics change manager, Information system engineer.

projects.title: Project management A-Frame order pick robots for 1.500 SKU
projects.description: As project manager responsible for the construction, implementation of 2 A-frame order pick robots for 1.500 SKU. Besides project management this included: - Construction floor 1.200 m2, 2 A-frames, 30 meter long each, flow racks, integration of A-frame robots with ERP system, build, execute test scripts to optimize interaction. make product relocation plan for medium fats movers, make SOP's, train staff using A-Frame's, update stock replenishment scheme. The project budget totalled Euro 6 million.

contributors.headline: Always looking for a new logistics challenge, please do not hesitate to challenge me. I prefer roles like: Project manager, Consultant, Logistics change manager, Information system engineer.

profile_positions.description: Logistics transformation lead Middle- & Western Europe. Implementation of S4Hana at Ekaterra including connecting systems by IM to new 3PL providers.
profile_positions.title: Adviseur projectmanagement

profile_positions.company: VALTESE, Value Added Logistics & TEchnical ExpertiSE
profile_positions.description:
Provision of management consultancy, interim management and project management services for organizations introducing / implementing a distribution organization in the EMEA region for industries like: Electronics, Aerospace, Renewable Energy and automotive electronics. Senior project management knowledge for Quick emergency Rework programs, Projects up and running within 48 hours after customer request, providing a mastercontract is in place.

VALTESE provides solutions for the warehouse / distribution center and supply chain

TFSM:
Transport Freight Spend Management program helps our customers to improve overall performance and transparency and saves our customers 5 to 8,5% of the annual freight budget without any substantial investment.All transactions regarding transport are monitored on cost, performance (KPI) tariff including all other shipper / carrier agreements in a central database linking the carier transaction, event and billing information with the shippers transport management system / order system. Providing internal transparancy to convergence towards a dual supplier solution per supply lane. We provide a team of transport apecialist monitoring all your transactions, interfering with the carrier when transactions do not perform.

VALTS:
Operate continious programs like: customizing, kitting, staging, quality testing and packaging of products.

QERS:
Quick Emergency Rework Services, turnkey deployment of team supervisor / teamleader and project manager and provisioning of personnel and equipment in a matter of 2 to 3 working days to handle Rework projects for OEM's.
profile_positions.title: Interim consultant / owner

profile_positions.description: Accepted assignment to support the company in the change process. Providing engineering support to the logistics operations. Participate in the team that prepares the organisation migrating to JD-Edwards. Support the logistics operations in implementing Integrate material handling systems like A-frames, autostore systems and shuttle systems. Lead the organization in change processes like: Implement operational excellence in the logistics operations including kaizen 5S, optimisation of central filling and online quality monitoring system for each section of the operation using KPI’s.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.company: Districon | MASTERING YOUR SUPPLY CHAIN & LOGISTICS
profile_positions.description: Develop/implement and present Transport Scan for our customers to improve overall performance and transparency in transport transactions. The goal is to create an optimized transport scheme for the customer where the transport chain gets optimized in service and price thru the use of a Business Intelligence layer over existing TMS and CMS systems using data analytics tools.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
- Initiate, develop and execute sales plan for the contract logistics solutions offered by Holland Shipping that includes customer target lists, canvasing potential customers in segments like Smart city and Hospital-to-the-home. 
- Develop new business cases in the contract logistics arena for Holland Shipping
- Initiate product development plan for the contract logistics business
- Follow up sales leads from initial contracts to RFI, RFQ, tendering, implementation of the new business wins and Key account Management.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Manager a.i.

profile_positions.description:
As group leader I manage a team of 15 persons taking care for shipping the new business door - and docking assemblies and spare parts that get shipped to customers in Europe and abroad. 

For new business operations the assemblies are produced by manufacturing operations in countries like: The Netherlands, Sweden, Baltic’s, Republic of Czech , Hungary and Rumania and moved to the closest cross dock in the Assa Abloy distribution network. All assemblies come together in the cross dock as the final door- or docking assembly and are just-in-time shipped to the final delivery address of the customer. 

For the spare parts operations the service logistics operations are managed by the spare parts headquarter shipping parts from main stores in Heerhugowaard. On a daily basis spare parts are shipped to field service operators and final delivery addresses of the customers. The main stores also takes care for the replenishment / supply of spare parts and sub assemblies to 7 local spare parts centres in Europe, Middle East and Asia.

On a daily basis door - and docking assemblies are loaded and shipped by truck load and containers to countries all over Europe and abroad. Spare Parts are shipped by express service and truck to more than 40 countries.

The distribution centre in Heerhugowaard handles Assa Abloy brands like: Albany, Besam, Crawford, Ditec, Normstahl, etc..
profile_positions.title: Groupleader New Business - and Service Logistics

profile_positions.description: Responsible for product design of logistics services operations like: Warehousing and distribution, return logistics, manufacturing logistics and value added service in the warehouse. Product design includes: make analysis of operational processes, create services definition for core services. Responsible for solution design of customer request for quotation. Make detailed analysis of existing business within company, make process flow design of core services, make competitor analysis, collect market information and create market analysis of potential business for the services, create extensive sales presentations of the product to be used by business development. Support business development with global supply chain design solutions for RFI and RFQ responses (Project for customers like: Dell, HP, Philips, Toshiba) Lead or support Supply Chain consultancy assignments to optimize supply chains in hubs and/or supply lanes (Projects for customers like: TDC Danish Telecom, Airbus).
profile_positions.title: Product - and solutions development Manager

profile_positions.description: Invited by the Exel Technology management to join Exel Technology EMEA leadership team in October 2002 to develop value added services capabilities in the warehouse on European scale. Responsible for the product development of technical services in the warehouse in the EMEA region. Responsible for new business opportunities in technical services. Initiate development of technical service product solutions like: secondary manufacturing, contract assembly, retail kitting, staging and deployment, recovery services, return management and repair services. Introduction of customer targeting for technical services customers. Responsible for European sales budget, 3 direct reports, responsible for 8 persons in EMEA team. Part of Exel EMEA leadership team. Main new business wins: Maxtor HDD assembly, euro10,0m per annum, Briggs and Stratton generator assembly, euro3,5 per annum, HP staging and deployment euro 3,5m business win, SITA Euro 1,0m business win
profile_positions.title: Product and business Development Director Technical Services

profile_positions.description: Responsibility for operations, project management, customer business reviews, new business, solution design, contract negotiations, HR and P & L budget owner. Coordinator of all European VAS activities responsible for assembly /configuration / kitting and repair of computer equipment in technical service facilities within warehouses in Europe. 35-40 customers, 9 direct reports, responsible for 85 to 500 persons working in 6 fixed sites and multiple temporary sites (rework projects).Business development assignments visiting (potential) customers in Europe and USA. Main customers: HP, Apple Computer, Canon Europe, Ricoh, Epson, Sony Europe, TPV and Hitachi. Member of the Management team of Exel West-Nederland.
profile_positions.title: Operations Manager

profile_positions.description: The joint venture's (50% Getronics NV and 50% Intexo NV) main activities included Value Added Services in the warehouse like: configuration or assembly of electronics (computers, routers), packaging and kitting, repair of monitors and rework projects. Most activities were organized in large workplaces at warehouses of Intexo at Schiphol Airport, Rotterdam Botlek, Zaandam and Wommelgem near Antwerp. For the large rework projects temporary buildings were hired to accommodate temporary modular production lines for 50 to 400 production stations. My responsibility was to manage the company operational, financial and commercially. The company had a minimum of 70 fixed persons on the payroll that would grow up to 450 persons during large rework programs and would shrink back to the pre rework group of persons.
profile_positions.title: Operations manager
